TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit UISearchBarDelegate_Extensions extends System.Object

summary.para: Extension methods to the interface to support all the methods from the protocol.

remarks.para: The extension methods for allow developers to treat instances of the interface as having all the optional methods of the original protocol. Since the interface only contains the required members, these extension methods allow developers to call the optional members of the protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void BookmarkButtonClicked (this UIKit.IUISearchBarDelegate This, UIKit.UISearchBar searchBar);
.method public static hidebysig void BookmarkButtonClicked(class UIKit.IUISearchBarDelegate This, class UIKit.UISearchBar searchBar) cil managed

Docs.param: The instance on which this extension method operates.
Docs.summary: Indicates that the bookmark button was tapped.
